control.name: 12.4 - Define information security responsibilities for all personnel on the security policies
control.desc: Without clearly defined security roles and responsibilities assigned, there could be inconsistent interaction with the security group, leading to unsecured implementation of technologies or use of outdated or unsecured technologies.

test.steps:
12.4.a Verify that information security policies clearly define information security responsibilities for all personnel.

12.4.b Interview a sample of responsible personnel to verify they understand the security policies.
